description: Serve as an industry advisor to the Computer Science department, providing guidance on curriculum development, industry trends, and student career preparation.
achievements: Advise on curriculum alignment with industry needs
Mentor students and provide career guidance
Support department initiatives and strategic planning

description: Founded and organize BSides South Jersey, a community-driven information security conference that brings together security professionals, researchers, and enthusiasts.
achievements: Established the first BSides conference in South Jersey
Build and foster a local cybersecurity community
Organize annual security conferences and events
